content.text:
# Comparison of photogrammetry software

Photogrammetry is the technique to extract geometric information from two-dimensional images or video.
Comparison of notable packages
{| class="wikitable sortable sort-under" style="font-size: 80%; text-align: center; width: auto;"
|+
|-
! Application
! License
! Platform
! Standalone / plugin
! Automatic modelling
! Scalability
! Type of photogrammetry
! Data source
! Inception
! Vendor / creator
! Guide price
! Online service
! Free tier or trial period
|-
! 3DF Zephyr
|
| Microsoft Windows
| Standalone
|
|
| Aerial, close-range, UAS
| Images, video, laser scan
| 2013
| 3DFLOW
|
|
| , Free Edition and Free Trial
|-
! Ames Stereo Pipeline
| Apache v2
| Linux and OSX
| Standalone
|
|
| Satellite, aerial, close-range
| Images
|
| NASA
|
|
|
|-

| Standalone
|
|
| Aerial, satellite, UAS
| Images

| Hexagon Geospatial

|
|
